name: Vitamin Enriched Eye Base Primer & Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid
categories: Skincare, Eye Care, Eye Creams & Treatments
about: What it is:¬†Bobbi Brown's #1 face moisturizer and primer, now for under eyes. This all-in-one undereye primer wakes up eyes by hydrating, plumping and brightening...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Fine Lines and Wrinkles..Formulation: Lightweight Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Vitamin A: Helps smooth fine lines around the eyes.- Vitamin E: Helps provide antioxidant benefits.- Caffeine: Helps reduce puffiness under the eye area over time.Ingredient Callouts:¬†Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, and phthalates. This product is also gluten-free.¬†What Else You Need to Know:¬†A nutrient-rich eye cream and undereye primer that moisturizes and plumps to soften the look of fine lines while leaving skin with a concealer-gripping finish. Like an undereye multivitamin, a nourishing vitamin blend (vitamins B3, B5, B6, B9, B12, plus sodium hyaluronate and shea butter) brightens, awakens and replenishes the undereye area.
ingredients: -Sodium Hyaluronate.-Shea Butter ..Water\Aqua\Eau, Dimethicone, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Butylene Glycol, Ppg-2 Myristyl Ether Propionate, Cetyl Alcohol, Peg-40 Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Rhodochrosite Extract, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Squalane, Trisiloxane, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Epilobium Angustifolium Flower\Leaf\Stem Extract, Yeast Extract\Faex\Extrait De Levure, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Spinacia Oleracea (Spinach) Leaf Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Extract, Algae Extract, Beta-Carotene, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Caffeine, Folic Acid, Pyridoxine Dipalmitate, Cyanocobalamin, Niacinamide, Retinyl Palmitate, Phytosphingosine, Fragrance (Parfum), Glycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Peg-20 Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, C12-15 Alkyl Ethylhexanoate, Tetrasodium Edta, Sodium Hydroxide, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Linalool, Bht, Sorbic Acid, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol...Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- After your morning cleansing routine, gently apply eye primer moisturizer to undereyes with fingers using a gentle patting motion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried every under eye product there is.  I've tried ones for aging and ones that claim to stop creasing.  None of them do the job.  EXCEPT this one.  It's next to impossible to find a moisturizing primer that will keep my concealer from creasing and looking caked.  Yes this primer is expensive, but you won't be disappointed - it's the best there is.  I needed less concealer than before - literally a micro drop - that glided on like butter & stayed put all day and into the evening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Because of my age , I have to really moisturize the area around my eyes to prevent concealer from highlighting my lovely creases (ok, wrinkles). I thought this would be perfect since it's supposed to do double duty as a moisturizer AND base primer. I was so bummed out when I used it for the first time because it wasn't even mildly moisturizing. I gave it a week just to make surel the first try wasn't a dry day thing. Once I applied it to skin it almost felt as if it were drying the area more and the liquid concealer I use caked right up on it.  Honestly, it didn't even feel like a moisturizer coming out of the jar?? If I didn't buy it new from Sephora, I would have sworn it was an old product because it was so firm in the jar, not at all creamy.   Anyhow, unless I did get an expired product somehow, I wouldn't suggest this for anyone of a certain age concerned with creases.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this innovative beauty gadget! It's the best thing invented since sliced bread y'all! What if I told you that I found the fountain of youth, would you believe me then! Well listen up to all the wonderful benefits this has! Theraface depuffing  wand is good for decreasing puffiness, it's great for enhancing radiance to your skins complexion, and the best part it helps to reduce dark circles! It's clinically proven to give you the best benefits possible. It has cold therapy which is one of my favorite features. It has heat therapy which I also that was fantastic! It's great for on the go treatments and guess what it's dermatologist approved. And US FDA registered. Wow now thats a lot of information to pack in yes I know. But beauty is skin deep and we all want flawless skin, right! The refreshing cold treatment has been helping with my puffiness, and reducing my dark circles and sculpts my face. It's rejuvenating heat encourages circulation and lymphatic drainage, and enhancing my skins radiance! My skin has already began to improve with just a few uses I can definitely tell I been using it. With continued use I'm excited to see what results this will help improve my skins texture and appearance. It's portable  and lightweight so I can travel with it easy. It's been helping to depuff and give me a beautiful glow every time. Theraface is all that and more gals and guys. It's perfect for everyone. It can be our little beauty secret.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If your eyes are at all sensitive avoid this product. I received a sample and it caused my eyes to water and burn like crazy. One day later and about half a bottle of eye drops it still burns. I‚Äôll never understand why so many companies put fragrance in eye creams.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most luxurious eye cream I've used. My mature undereye lines appeared to lessen and remained so even after hours of wear.

reviews.review_text: My fav eye cream with the jumbo size primer + moisturizer of this. It works so well with my super dry skin and I have always received compliments on my base

reviews.review_text: this Pic says it all  I love this product I enjoy prepping my skin before makeup this just feels good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I love the results of this moisturizer ! Don‚Äôt even have to use to much product to use so it will last you pretty long. Recommend if you want your dark eyes to disappear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I initially wanted to not like this cream when I bought it during VIB in November 2023. I wanted to think it was overhyped and overpriced. I use Tretinoin on my face (not eyes) regularly and sometimes my eye area gets flakey from residue making its way to my eyes when I sleep. This makes it really hard for me to wear concealer as I have fine lines and dark circles so I'd rather not go out bare faced in that area, but it looks worse when it's flakey and with makeup. So I gave in and bought this cream. I use it day and night on my lids and under eye area. It absorbs quickly and you don't need a lot. I have not seen any flakiness since I started this cream (however I do not use any retinol eye cream under my eyes so keep this in mind). I apply this at night BEFORE my Tretinoin on my face and I find there is no Tret residue making its way to my eye area when I wake up so no flaking. It works really well with Haus Labs concealer, Hourglass, and Kosas. I still get SOME creasing but it's so minimal to what I'm used to. Also creasing is normal for a lot of people because of their texture so don't expect 100% filtered skin from any eye cream, but this one does help keeping my eye area from getting crusty dry/flakey, and makes my concealers look better and last longer than if I used no eye cream. It also does not pill under makeup but again, don't go heavy handed you don't need to. Also tried comparing it to the Biossance eye cream which is almost as popular, and this one wins by a long shot. The Biossance is too light and feels more like a gel, but I don't feel as moisturized at all

reviews.review_title: Must have for eye area dark circles,moisture.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this eye vitamin cream for 2 yrs. It helped me with dark circles and fines lines.And I‚Äôm an African American but a lighter skinned so you can see dark circles. And I use this everyday and I‚Äôve seen a big difference since I‚Äôve used it.

reviews.review_title: The Perfect Eye Cream AND Under Eye Primer Exists!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect texture. Not to oily so my concealer stays put. Feels luxurious like it‚Äôs big sister - the Face Base.

I love this under eye primer. It‚Äôs such a plus that it doubles as an eye cream with vitamins. The texture is soo great I use it everyday even when I don‚Äôt apply makeup. It‚Äôs not sticky or uncomfortable. Recommend giving it a go. Offered by bobbibrowm

reviews.review_title: Smells Great, Works Okay, But Irritated Eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Vitamin Enriched Eye Base complimentary from Bobbi Brown in exchange for my honest review. In the container, the cream seems somewhat thick, making it difficult to get more than just a slight swipe of product off the top. However, this isn‚Äôt an issue as you only need a small amount of product for a full undereye application. Additionally, the product feels lightweight and creamy (not thick) during application. It also has a very pleasant floral/botanical scent to it. As much as I enjoy the scent though, I prefer to avoid having any fragrance in my products that I use near my eyes. Once applied, the cream seems to absorb well, although it does require some time before you can continue with your makeup. I did feel like it was moisturizing and provided some slight improvement in the appearance of my dark circles. When I applied concealer over too, I did feel like the makeup applied more smoothly and my concealer was more effective at providing coverage. However, it did seem like as I continued to wear it through the day, it started to feel and look drier. The main issue I had though was that it seemed to cause some eye irritation when I used it, especially if I used it by itself without anything on top. I experienced a lot of watering and tearing the first time I tried it by itself. As a result, that significantly impacts my rating. Others with sensitive eyes may also have trouble with this cream, but for those whose eyes are not bothered by the product, I think it‚Äôs a okay eye base, but a bit more expensive for what it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Bobbi Brown. Just like the moisturizer, this eye base has been a favorite of mine. First off, the packaging is a mini version of the moisturizer; sleek and with a twist off lid.  The consistency is creamy but very light weight and hydrating. Personally a little goes a long way with this product. It blends nicely under makeup and absorbs well without leaving any tacky residue. I do recommend waiting a few minutes before applying makeup because it does take a little time to fully absorb into the skin. It has little to no scent, personally didn‚Äôt seem like anything to me but others might not like it. I have combination skin and this worked well for me with hydration and bringing back that awake look under my eyes. Especially because it contains shea butter, a lot of different vitamin b‚Äôs, and of course vitamin c. Has really brightened and hydrated my under eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bobby Brown did it again. This vitamin enriched eye base is worth it. It‚Äôs luxurious texture is wonderful. It‚Äôs formula contains all the necessary ingredients to make the skin around my eyes healthy. It has hyaluronic acid, shea butter, caffeine, Vitamins A,B3,C and E . My skin looks well rested, brighter and less puffy. It is also fast absorbing and works great with my concealer. It provides a seamless base. Perfect addition to my daily routine. Offered by Bobbibrown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Bobbi Brown and Skeeper in exchange for an honest review.  It is a facial moisturizer for the under eye area, it acts as a primer for concealer.  I have combination skin and according to my research, it is suitable for all skin types.  It absorbs extremely well and quickly into my skin.  I can feel a noticeable difference right after using it, my skin is softer and more moisturized.  It makes makeup work better on my skin.  I love how it really moisturizes my under eye area without feeling greasy.  I really love this product.  As someone who wears makeup every day, this is perfect for me.  This is the best foundation for any type of makeup application.  You don't have to worry about your eye makeup slipping off.  I absolutely love it and highly recommend it to everyone.

reviews.review_text: It works best for the girls with dark circles. It helps to smooth out the skin eo when the foundation is applied on it. It gives a fine look. This eyebase was offered by boobibrown and I completely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Bobbi brown the vitamin enriched eye base is a skincare infused primer specifically for the delicate eye area. Its creamy texture instantly hydrates and nourishes the skin. Giving you a smooth canvas for makeup application. It's formulated with blends of vitamin B,E,C along with shea butter. It's lightweight texture absorbs quickly leaving the skin feeling moisturized, refreshed, and rejuvenated. Wear alone for a natural refreshed look or as primer to enhance the longevity of eye makeup. It's must have addition to any skincare and makeup routine for those seeking hydration, protection and flawless makeup application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Vitamin Enriched Eye Base moisturizing primer is a versatile product that does more than just hydrate the skin. Acting as both a hydrator and a primer, it creates a smooth canvas for concealer and other eye makeup, ensuring a flawless application that lasts all day. Its lightweight formula is a standout feature, providing ample moisture without feeling heavy or greasy, and only a small amount is needed for effective results. Packed with vitamins it not only hydrates but also nourishes the delicate undereye area. It deliver immediate and long-lasting moisture upon application, leaving the skin feeling hydrated and refreshed throughout the day. Gifted by Bobbi Brown.

I have used this complimentary from Bobbi Brown enriched eye base a couple of times now. I have noticed a significant difference in my under eyes. They look bright and more awake. It feels lightweight so it can be used over eye shadow and eye creams.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This under eye moisturizer doubles as a primer. I like that it has caffeine, because I definitely need to reduce plumpness. It goes on super smooth and absorbs quickly. It gives a real nice base to apply concealer. Offered by Bobbibrown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was gifted by Bobibrow. This product really reduces those deep lines between the eye brows. As well as regular wrinkles that come from the assault of time on one‚Äôs face. It is silky and aborbs quickly. It makes the face feel soft without being heavy or feeling we

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Simply amazing. My first time using anything and it was gifted by Bobbi brown. I used it as a primer for my eye products. They way it lasted and how it looked throughout the day was just flawless for me. Very soft and lightweight. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received complimentary from Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Eye Base.This all-in-one undereye primer wakes up eyes by hydrating, plumping, brightening, and softening the look of fine lines. Its cushiony finish is nutrient-rich but never heavy, creating a smooth base for seamless corrector and concealer application. Lightweight texture! So moisturize! Not greasy! Won't irritate my eyes! Very soft touching, nursing, hydrating and smoothing! Layers perfectly under corrector and concealer.Great under makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: No effect whatsoever on my eyes. It‚Äôs a very thin, liquidy moisturizer. It‚Äôs also not absorbent. If putting it on prior to make up, you have to wait ample time for it to dry or else under eye concealer won‚Äôt cover. Would not recommend and will not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as complimentary offered by Bobbi Brown. It feels so soft and dries quickly to wear under my make up. It helps the make up so smooth and stays longer than I expected. It also reduces the lines below my eyebrows. The scent is pleasant and light. I like that it does triple duty under my makeup as a primer, moisturizer, and skin vitamins. My foundation goes on smoother and my aging undereye skin looks less crepey when I use concealer on top of it for my very dark undereye area.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Bobbi Brown under eye corrector, I have been using this product for the past week. I have not noticed any changes under my eye since using this product. I do not recommend this product, there was not changes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Bobbi Brown for review. I love this product! It‚Äôs such a luxurious feeling with a great scent. It makes my skin look great with makeup. The face base is amazing as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super rich and creamy. Gifted by Bobbi Brown. Enriched with vitamins, this creamy base hydrates and nourishes the delicate skin around my eyes, prepping it for flawless makeup application. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly, leaving my skin smooth and primed for concealer and eyeshadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Bobbi Brown for my honest review. As someone who loves the Vitamin Enriched Face Base, I was very excited to try the Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Eye Base and it definitely didn‚Äôt disappoint. I have dry, sensitive skin especially under my eyes and this product is amazing. It is a wonderful eye cream by itself without makeup. It keeps my under eyes very hydrated and doesn‚Äôt irritate my sensitive eyes. It is also amazing as an under eye primer when using makeup. It gives a nice hydrated, smooth base for my concealer to lay. It keeps my concealer looking beautiful all day without any creasing or separation throughout the day which I love. I definitely plan to keep using this in the future with and without makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this vitamin eye cream! it super hydrating and i love the formula. gives my eyes great hydration, smoothing out fines lines and wrinkles! i highly recommend if you need to brighten up or get rid of fine lines! complimentary from bobbibrown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received Vitamin Enriched Eye Base as a complimentary gifted by Bobbi Brown for testing purposes.  I have to admit this stuff is amazing. I can only say great things about it.I like that the eye base is the best of  a primer and a moisturizer in one. You only need to use the smallest amount of product on your under eye to achieve instant results . This eye Primer instantly hydrates and nourishes my under eye area . It‚Äôs Lightweight and fast-absorbing . This primer goes on smooth and feels very nice. It sets the stage for my concealer. Lovely to apply. This product is a must-have for me. Can't live without it! I definitely recommend this one for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by BobbiBrown. Used the product this morning and love it. First off, it smells so good & clean. It has a very thin consistency and blended in really well to my under eye area. My skin looked and felt hydrated and nourished. My eyes appear to not have any bags under them & the eye area looks to be brighter. I didn't apply any makeup today because I wanted to see if this product would truly just sit on my skin and blend in well & it did. It's not greasy or heavy at all, I definitely can tell why this can double as a primer, because it blends right into your skin and leaves no creases or oil. Very impressed with this little jar, a little goes a long way so only use a small dab under each eye!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made the skin under my eyes sooo soft and smooth. It really is a perfect under eye primer for makeup. It smells as good as the other vitamin enriched products as well, but not too strong of a scent; it won‚Äôt burn your eyes or anything. All of the vitamin enriched line is worth the price. (Gifted by Bobbi brown)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best eye primer I have ever tried. Some concealers look cakey, dry and eventually show my fine lines. Ever since i started using this base it fixed that problem. I‚Äôm also in love with the creamy texture. Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really have enjoyed using this eye primer it is great for those no makeup makeup days and great for when you want wear a full face of makeup it doesn't increase your concealer or eye shadow. Gifted by Bobby Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from bobbi brown in exchange for my honest review.  I have dry eyes so when I use concealer it can sometimes look too dry and show more lines. This eye primer feels hydrating and helps my concealer not look cakey or dry. I like that it also has skincare benefits that will help my eyes in the long run. It does not disturb any other skincare or makeup products I use on top of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great primer/eye cream! Leaves my undereye area feeling so smooth and hydrated and makeup applies so well over it! Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a great base for their undereye concealer! Offered by Bobbibrown in exchange for my honest feedback.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the vitamin enriched eye base cream & primer complimentary from Bobbi Brown. The first thing I noticed after opening was the smell, it‚Äôs very light and refreshing. Aside that from that, I prefer to use this more as a moisturizer at night than in the morning as a primer under my concealer. I find that a little goes a long way. It‚Äôs definitely very moisturizing but it was slightly too heavy to use under concealer. I experienced a little bit of pilling. I would recommend it if you‚Äôre in the market for a luxurious moisturizer but not so much as a primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Offered by bobbibrown. The Bobbi Brown Enriched Eye Base is a game-changer for anyone seeking a reliable primer. Its velvety texture glides on smoothly, creating a perfect canvas for eyeshadow application. The formula is hydrating without being greasy, ensuring longevity and preventing creasing. The subtle tint helps neutralize discoloration, brightening the eyes. While it comes at a higher price point, its effectiveness justifies the investment for a flawless eye makeup look that lasts throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The texture is smooth and creamy, making it easy to apply, and it serves as an excellent primer for my eyeshadow. I've noticed that it helps my eye makeup stay in place throughout the day without creasing. Additionally, the added vitamins and moisturizing properties seem to have improved the overall appearance and texture of my eyelids. It is also doesn't irritate my sensitive skin.  Gifted by BobbiBrown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bobbi Brown's Vitamin Enriched Eye Base gifted by bobbibrown is a must-have. Hydrating with Hyaluronic Acid, nourishing vitamins, and caffeine for reduced puffiness. Its lightweight texture provides a perfect base, enhancing the undereye area for a refreshed and radiant look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow is all I can say! I love how this cream literally glides onto my skin and it gives me such a glow. I feel this is the perfect eye cream to use in the morning as it really brightens my under eyes and makes me look and feel more awake! I also love the packaging as it feels very secure. So secure that I would feel safe placing it into my suitcase without worrying about it leaking or spilling out. This eye cream is well worth it. I was gifted by bobbibbrown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who deals with creasing under my eyes, I‚Äôm always looking for something to help with the creasing. This eye base is wonderful for moisturizing and prepping the under-eye area for concealer. It helps prevent creasing & layers beautifully on top of makeup. I enjoy this eye base a lot & was gifted by bobbibrown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and I tend to have creasing issues . This primer has ereally helped to make my eyeshadow stay in really well . It stopped my creasing issue and it brought out the color in my eye shadows

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's very moisturizing, and minimizes my fine lines. As a primer it's mediocre.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This producted was gifted by Bobbi Brown in exchange for my honest review. I have pretty dry skin and I am always looking to extra moisturize under my skin whether it's to wear makeup or bare faced. I love how luxurious the packaging is and was really impressed with how the product smoothed out under my eyes! When I wake up in the morning my skin is parched, but when wearing this you couldn't tell! I feel like a little goes a long way with this product. Pictured is my eye without makeup about an hour after applying the product. I recommend this to anyone who has dry skin under their eyes and wants a blurring effect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best primer I use‚Ä¶ there is a light tangerine scent I really like. This is the best primer that will reduce your pores. Even thought it‚Äôs for eye base I use it as a primer because it really help minimizing my pores when I apply foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: my go to eye cream for makeup days or no makeup days! always makes my eyes look so refreshed. love love love been using this for over 4yrs

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Bobbi Brown. I like this under eye primer. It‚Äôs very hydrating and softening. My concealer goes on more smoothly using this. I like the texture of the cream and how nicely it melts into skin.

reviews.review_title: Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Eye Base Cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Eye Base Cream & Primer.  3-stars.  Good for sensitive eyes as it doesn't irritate or sting them.  I wish it was a little more moisturizing for my dry skin eye area.  Will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Bobbi Brown. This is a nice eye base. It‚Äôs a very soft, lightweight cream that smooths and hydrates my undereyes. My makeup looks really nice after using this. It definitely extends the life of my undereye makeup and helps give it a beautiful, crease  free look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is what I was looking for trust me! hello hydratation and it make my concealer look amazing

reviews.review_text: After just receiving this product and trying it out, I am really loving it. The product quite literally just glides into my skin feeling so silky and soft. I also have found that my under eye appears to be much brighter! I love love love the consistency of it and overall it‚Äôs a great undereye cream/base.  I received this complimentary from Bobbi brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kindly gifted by Bobbi Brown. So this serum is actually quiet a game changer. My skin feels soft,supple, smooth and healthy looking. The texture is incredible and sets into my skin really nicely. I usually don't mind scented products so this being scented is okay for me.

reviews.review_title: Game changer for under eye concealer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve never used a base before my under eye concealer. I‚Äôll never go back. What a game changer. I use less product and wow does the product blend and sit well.

reviews.review_title: a must have for smooth undereyes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this eye base in every prep that I do I'm on my 3rd jar! It not only plumps up the undereye a bit but it also allows the concealer to lay very smoothly under the eyes without any creasing! Pro MUA tip - a little bit goes a long way! If you feel that your concealer is creasing you're either using too much of the eye base, too much of the concealer or both! The photo is an example of the eye base to use on my beautiful client! Feel free to check out my ig for more inspo and tips! @thekingkasie :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: wanted so badly to work for me. but if i put it on top of my eye cream it separates the concealer and without the cream its still not a seamless base. i have normal skin type, this was hydrating and feels buttery but not a good base for makeup for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice smell and very creamy. This does what it says it will do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This only requires a little and I bought the small size and know it will last me a long time. I normally use Milk and Elf primer mixed together. But I tried this alone and after a hour it really made my make-up look nicer.  Very smooth and natural look. I took off 1 star because it does seem to make your face oiler for some reason. If you have oily skin, this may not be best for you. It's good for normal to dry skin.
